verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> don't <S%H3198><s%> rebuke me in your anger, <S%H639><s%> neither discipline <S%H3256><s%> me in your wrath. <S%H2534><s%>
Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, for I am faint. <S%H536><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> heal <S%H7495><s%> me, <S%H6106><s%> for my bones are troubled. <S%H926><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> is also in great <S%H3966><s%> anguish. <S%H926><s%> But you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh â€”how long?
Return, <S%H7725><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Deliver <S%H2502><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> me for your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%>' sake.
For in death <S%H4194><s%> there is no memory <S%H2143><s%> of you. <S%H7585><s%> In Sheol, who shall give you thanks? <S%H3034><s%>

I am weary <S%H3021><s%> with my groaning. <S%H585><s%> Every night <S%H3915><s%> I flood <S%H7811><s%> my bed. <S%H4296><s%> I drench <S%H4529><s%> my couch <S%H6210><s%> with my tears. <S%H1832><s%>
My eye <S%H5869><s%> wastes <S%H6244><s%> away because of grief. <S%H3708><s%> It grows old <S%H6275><s%> because of all my adversaries. <S%H6887><s%>
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from me, <S%H6466><s%> all you workers of iniquity, <S%H205><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my weeping. <S%H1065><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> my supplication. <S%H8467><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> accepts <S%H3947><s%> my prayer. <S%H8605><s%>
May all my enemies <S%H341><s%> be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and dismayed. <S%H926><s%> <S%H3966><s%> They shall turn back, <S%H7725><s%> they shall be disgraced <S%H954><s%> suddenly. <S%H7281><s%>
